title: Author
text:
Since 2021, he has been the Global Innovation Manager. He leads the development of novel sensors for emerging applications (robotics, wearable devices). In addition to hands-on product design, he has a keen interest in constantly expanding his toolbox of engineering and management methodsâ€”in particular system modeling, prototyping and lean product development.
He has published about 30 peer-reviewed publications in international journals and conferences, covering nano-electronic devices, circuit/system design, and sensor product development. He holds 4 patent, and is a IASCC Six Sigma Black Belt (2017).
